message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers exceptional value, but I'm open to discussing a fair deal. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate the value you think the product offers, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer on the product at this price, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet halfway and settle on $10,000? This offer reflects the product's true value while still offering you a fair deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $8,000. How about we meet at $9,000? I think that's a fair price for the product.
